item.description: Game will be played on Forge/Foundry. Link to the game: https://forge-vtt.com/invite/thenicoftime-kalipso-sector/74d82189-857a-455d-9cb0-bec032943222 Step 1: choose a race. There are several races in the main book, and 4 alien archive expansion books, you can find those in the rules channel.

The intelligence service of the [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]. Crimson Tide A front organization for Eberswalde. This is the organization that gives [[Alexander De Leon]] his missions.
Mercenary group from [[Pino]].
The government of the moon [[Nchak]]. Made of Trox, where [[Amos]] is from, follows [[Hylax]].
Under the sphere of influence of the [[[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]].
A republic of united planets. The capital planet is [[Svallga]] in the Thorhil sector. They have an edge on technology and solarian magic compared to [[The Poleus Bloc]].
Has an edge in magic to [[The Federation of United Planets]].
A government/planet that operates as a proxy state for [[The Poleus Bloc]]. On [[Thurid]]
Eberswalde DEEP well site 4 (The Shard) Nickname: The Shard A prison that almost no-one comes out of once they arrive, including the guards.

One of the oldest colonies of the Federation. A planet that is the major manufacturing center for the Federation, the last remnants of the society that owned the world before the Federation is the ritual combat used to settle some disputes.
Koblenz Capital of the [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]. A city built on top of and within the remnants of an ancient [[Terran Mandate]] city.
The main hub for pcs. A space station they are based out of. Has a casino. Located in the Saritri Pala system, hex 0610, orbiting a gas giant.
These are ancient artifacts only found in this sector, and only recently discovered (~100 years ago) that they can be used to produce efficient energy.
Leader of [[Tiandi]].
Biography He is a handler for the PCs for [[Tiandi]]. His character is heavily based on Frisbee from Redline. He is a golbin.
The preeminant Bloc scientist on Math Drives. His name is just Jacob Bosch. He is an old man with a heavy accent, long white beard, and a bald head.
A dark skinned man with a shaven head and tattoos on his left arm depicting a serpent creature from his homeworld.
Groq is a large Nuar, a minatour like creature in [[Skidds]]’ crew.

The [[Nchak Ascendancy]] ambassador to the [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]], a very high up position in the government. A very straight-laced Trox, unlike [[Amos]], who always does things by the book and non-violently.
video
A Vesk data analyst for the [[Sector Information#The Federation of United Planets Federation or FUP]], being locked up on suspicion for being a Bloc double agent.
Description An average height human woman with shoulder length purple hair and a red scarf draped over her white prison jumpsuit.
A Bantrid in the employ of the [[Fyre Syndicate]]. Talks very strangely, is very excitable about the world. Constantly rolls back and forth while talking excitedly.
Skidds is a gnoll under the employ of [[Tiandi]]. He is the leader of the rival crew to the PC’s.
Description A Shirren who wears nothing but the prison jumpsuit, with no alterations or additions unlike a majority of the prisoners in the Shard.
Title: Bodyguards for hire Client: [[Thucalan Royal Family]] Reward: 1000 credits per crew member Requirements: 2-4 crew Transport Requirements: None
Title: Clear your names Client: [[Avry Raeyen]] Reward: 2000 credits Requirements: Ship transport, 5-6 crew Reputation: +10 [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]
Title: Deliver Bosch Client: [[The Poleus Bloc]] Reward: 1200 credits per crew member Requirements: Ship transport, 2-4 crew Reputation: +10 [[The Poleus Bloc]]
Title: Disrespect the past Client: [[Pheren Highte]] Reward: 1500 credits per crew member Requirements: 2-3 crew Reputation: +5 [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]

Title: Sand Blasting Client: [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]] Reward: 6000 credits (-2000 for intermediary fee) Requirements: 3-6 crew Reputation: +5 [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]
Title: Sand Surfing Client: [[Alcippe resistance movement]] Reward: 4000 credits Requirements: 3-6 crew Reputation: -5 [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]
Title: Stealing a boat Client: [[Zaiba Corp]] Reward: 1100 credits per crew member Requirements: 2-4 crew Reputation: +5 [[The Federation of United Planets|Federation]]

John Alexander De Leon, current assassin for [[Eberswalde]] he is currently on mission to infiltrate the space station and eliminate (insert person of interest here), he is a android but with the Impersonation Matrix feature so he can look like a normal human if he wishes.
Backstory So the Trox are very peace loving defenders generally. They welcome everyone with open arms and detest violence, but they’re not pacifists.
Drew INTRODUCTION Demitra DeMarco is a human female spacefaring mercenary looking to make her name well-known amongst the “independent contractor” profession to find her parents’ killer.
Quest An archeologist, was arrested for stealing an artifact.

Devin Background Lutri is a famed lawyer renowned for his defense of Lemonade Sampson and largely for a quote in the case of the murder of the mermodels, the disgruntled human ×-husband allegedly left a flipper at the underwater home of his x-wife’s new girlfriend (among many other details) but as part of his defense, Lutri made him try it on.
John Written Backstory “Nuros” was part of a merc company that received a job to pick up some civilians on some backwater hostile world.

Stats Hit Points: 12 Stamina: 7 Ability scores Strength: 16 Dexterity: 8 Constitution: 10 Intelligence: 10 Wisdom: 10 Charisma: 10 Class: Solarian SOLAR MANIFESTATION(SU) At 1st level, you gain a physical manifestation of your stellar power.

![[StarsWithoutNumberRevised-DeluxeEdition-011418_(32633169).pdf]] Overview This campaign will use a combination of Stars Without Number and Starfinder rpg rules. For the most part, Starfinder will be the dominant game we will be using.

Setting The campaign takes place in Kalipso sector, a large sector of interconnected space embroiled in a 60-year long cold-war between two superpowers, the [[The Federation of United Planets]] and the [[The Poleus Bloc]].
The guards will clear out cell block A and form a perimeter to the door of the center room. [[Kolt]]’s gang will have 2 members dressed up as guards with them.

Intro into the world: This campaign takes place mostly in the Stars without Number universe. Humanity spread across the stars from Earth, finding many worlds to inhabit and many alien species to interact with.
Bryce Reading the stars Defeated 2 Akata (400 XP each) 1 Guard officer(800 XP) 2 Guards (400 XP each) 700XP each
APL calculation (2 or 1) PCs playing [[Lutri]] (level 1), [[Nuros]] (level 1), [[Amos]] (level 1), [[Qusari]] (level 1), [[Demitra DeMarco]] (level 1), [[Jean-Pierre]] (level 1)
APL calculation (2 or 1) PCs playing [[Lutri]] (level 1), [[Nuros]] (level 1), [[Amos]] (level 1), [[Qusari]] (level 1), [[Drew]] (level 1), [[Jean-Pierre]] (level 1)
XP calculation: CR 1 from Laser trap, CR 4 for 2 ferrofluid oozes, CR 2 from tier 2 computer, CR 2 from interacting with Sven.
APL calculation (3) PCs playing [[Lutri]] (level 2), [[Nuros]] (level 2), [[Amos]] (level 2), [[Qusari]] (level 2), [[Demitra DeMarco]] (level 2), [[Jean-Pierre]] (level 2)
APL calculation (3) PCs playing [[Lutri]] (level 2), [[Alexander De Leon]] (level 2), [[Amos]] (level 2), [[Qusari]] (level 2), [[Demitra DeMarco]] (level 2)
Making their starship Size options: Small or Medium Tier 2: Build points: 75 They can build whatever ship they want with their build points.
Contract: [[Clear your names]] PCs: [[Amos]], [[Lutri]], [[Alexander De Leon]], [[Demitra DeMarco]], [[Jean-Pierre]], [[Qusari]] APL: 4 Before session Message John about the smuggler.
The ship that [[Lutri]], [[Alexander De Leon]], [[Qusari]], [[Demitra DeMarco]], [[Jean-Pierre]], and [[Amos]] found on [[Eberswalde DEEP Well sites#Eberswalde DEEP well site 4 The Shard|The Shard]].
